description: These scholarships are awarded to students who show excellence in their language studies. Eligibility Requirements Major/Minor in German Minimum 3.0 GPA Club participation, leadership, involvement in outreach events, or have plans for participation in a study tour Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
